directions: In a medium bowl or jar, combine the onion, parsley, oregano, garlic, salt, black pepper, and red pepper. Add the oil and vinegar and mix well. Store covered for a couple of days and use before the herbs start to turn brown.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves
1 teaspoon finely grated or minced garlic
title: Ox’s Chimichurri
